Package heroes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Buff
    Buff is something that gives additional adjustments to hero parameters e.g Buff can improve power or increase/decrease Sin value
    BuffFactory
    This class provides convinient creation of different Buff instances
    Hero
    Represents a hero that controls himself in own thread.
    HeroAutomate
    Automate, has states, can transit between them Can transit backwards
    HeroFactory
    Spawns different heroes easily
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Hero.MortalSins
    Represents all kinds of MortalSins, supported by the game ANGER:
    + makes hero more powerful
    - makes hero dangerous to everyone
    - less retreat chance
    - can make a mess in the Tower treat: Trainings, Poisons ENVY:
    + better use of infernal items
    + tends to gain XP
    - can deny working with high-leveled heroes
    - can betray his mate PRIDE:
    + better teaching
    + better learning spells
    + accepts more complicated quests
    - denies easy quests
    - tends to walk alone AVARICE:
    + better gaining items and money
    - doesn't share finding
    - easy to become possessed by demons LUST:
    + easier to make arrangements
    + can recruit rivals
    + can solve the conflicts with civilians
    - can be seduces by a rival
    - can harass mates GLUTTONY:
    + resistible to physical damage
    - useless versus quick enemies
    - always must be full before embarking
    HeroState
    Hero States IDLE: does nothing, can recieve orders WALKING: walks somewhere SEARCHING: searches in the location FIGHT: hero is locked for fighting RETREAT: hero is retreating from fighting RETREAT: goes back to tower
